Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: By the end of the course, the student will gain knowledge of the main practical methods used in Internet marketing. Among the topics covered in the course will be website design, search engine marketing, social media marketing, e-mail marketing, and Internet-based content creation. Social media marketing and search engine marketing will be the cornerstones of the course, as they are most important in nowadays marketing.
description.et: Aine läbinud tudeng omandab teadmised peamistest praktilistest meetoditest, mida kasutatakse tänapäeva internetiturunduses. Läbitavate teemade hulka kuuluvad veebilehe disain, otsingumootori turundus, sotsiaalmeedia turundus, e-kirja turundus ja veebikeskne sisuloome. Aine rõhuasetus on rohkem sotsiaalmeedia turunduse kasutamisel, pidades silmas asjaolu, et just see on kriitilise tähtsusega tänases internetiturunduse strateegias.

objectives.en: Students will gain knowledge about the main internet marketing concepts and tools.
objectives.et: Tudeng omandab põhiteadmised tänapäeva internetiturunduse enim kasutatud kontseptsioonidest ja tööriistadest.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has passed this course will:
- be able to bring out the most important components of internet marketing strategy,
learning_outcomes.et: - teab ja oskab välja tuua mis on kõige olulisemad internetiturunduse strateegia komponendid,

learning_outcomes.en: - know how to create high-quality web pages and how to assess other webpages,
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab luua kvaliteetset veebilehte ja hinnata teisi veebilehti,

learning_outcomes.en: - know how to implement funnel theory in context of internet marketing,
learning_outcomes.et: - teab "funnel theory" rakendamise pritsiipe internetiturunduse strateegias,

learning_outcomes.en: - be skilled in using search engine marketing,
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab rakendada otsingumootori turunduse peamiseid põhimõtteid,

learning_outcomes.en: - have an understanding how to use the social media ecosystem,
- be able to create social media campaigns and implement them.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab luua sotsiaalmeedia kampaaniaid ja neid ellu viia.

notes.et: The course will start on the 1st of March and run until the end of April. The course consists of video lectures and is therefore a fully online course. A new video lecture will be uploaded to Moodle every week. Some longer videos will also be available in a more comfortable shorter video, that adds up to the longer lecture. You can view these lecture at any time you wish. So you are not confined to a specific day or time. The only limiting factor is the tests You need to take a Moodle test for every topic. These tests have to be taken on each of the respective weeks when that topic video lecture is made public. So you need to look at the lecture videos every week and take one test, but the day and time you do it, on that week is up to you.

description.et: Participation or viewing of all the lectures is obligatory.
Moodle tests have to be passed (75% each).

grade_preconditions.et: Watching all the lecture videos and successfully taking all the moodle tests (at least 75% each).

grade_evaluation.et: Moodle testid ja lisapunktid temaatilistest ülesannetest.

description.et: Use of AI in internet marketing (Kristian Pentus)
Event marketing (case of sTARTUp Day) (Andres Kuusik)
